title: Mr. Robot Digital After Show
resume: A live weekly online series, hosted by The Verge, that dives into the complexities of USA Network's critically acclaimed hacker drama, Mr. Robot. Each episode features an in-depth discussion about the most recent episode of Mr. Robot from both an artistic and technological perspective.
